row.string: If a boy and a half can eat a hot dog and a half in a minute and a half how many hot dogs can six boys eat in six minutes?
Six to be precise. We have the same amount of time but four times as many boys so the answer is four times as many hot dogs.
"At night they come without being fetched And by day they are lost without being stolen."
"Did you hear the story about the peacock?"
"Did you hear the story about the smog?"
"You don't have to tell me it's all over town."
